title: Ticket #4471: Windows looses forward process on jobs with schedd turned off then on
description: While exploring schedd restart tests and this rust, I encountered misbehaviour on windows with a schedd off/ schedd on scenario. On linux if you have running jobs and you turn off the schedd and turn it back on, you see a disconnect, a reconnect and then you see the jobs complete. On windows you see an eviction, a failed reconnect and then rescheduled jobs. The behaviour should be the same.
remarks: We will have to see these tests after windows reconnects work.
